headline: Billionaire Tim Draper Says His Son Beat Him To 'The Best Investment Of The Decade': 'My Son's Returns Solidly Beat My Own'
summary: Billionaire Tim Draper has revealed some new lore about "the first family of Silicon Valley." In a proud dad moment, Draper said Tuesday on X that son Adam Draper beat him to "the best investment of the decade." The investment in question is leading cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN), a venture known to have been backed by the father and son. Draper said he had missed out on the company’s seed round due to a conflict of interest, but his son, having no such constraints, had dived in

headline: Trump’s ‘Crypto Week’ Set Back by House Vote
summary: House members voted down a key procedural measure that would have cleared the way for votes on cryptocurrency-related bills, despite President Donald Trump having declared this “Crypto Week” on his social media account.  A dozen Republicans joined Democrats in opposing the measure, and the resulting 196-223 vote prevented the House from debating and moving forward to vote on legislation to fund the Defense Department for the 2026 fiscal year and three cryptocurrency bills.  The House was hoping to get to a vote on the Genius Act, which creates a regulatory framework for stablecoins.

raw.headline: Trump’s ‘Crypto Week’ Set Back by House Vote

A dozen Republicans joined Democrats in opposing the measure, and the resulting 196-223 vote prevented the House from debating and moving forward to vote on legislation to fund the Defense Department for the 2026 fiscal year and three cryptocurrency bills.  The House was hoping to get to a vote on the Genius Act, which creates a regulatory framework for stablecoins.

headline: Coinbase Is the Real Trump Trade as Stock Set for Record Closing High
summary: The crypto sector has thrived since President Donald Trump took office in January—Bitcoin set a record high Monday—buoyed by legislative developments, dropped lawsuits, and the appointment of crypto-friendly regulators.  As perhaps the biggest name in digital assets outside of  itself,  Coinbase  has had a particularly strong start to 2025.  “No other company (and industry) may be benefitting more under Trump,” wrote analysts at Ned Davis Research in a research note.
